name: Monkey Island 2 Special Edition: LeChuck’s Revenge
description:
This script will install "Monkey Island 2 - Special Edition - LeChuck’s Revenge" GOG edition.
During install please let all options by default.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Press F1 to change classic/modern version.
- Multilanguage: you will be able to choose your preferred language for menus and subtitles during install between english (default), french, italian, german and spanish.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

script.custom-name: Monkey Island 2 - Special Edition - LeChuck’s Revenge - GOG

input_menu.description: Choose your preferred language for game interface and subtitles:

execute.command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Monkey Island 2 SE"; rm -f -r rm -f -r __support GameuxInstallHelper.dll goggame-1425039730.* language_setup.* webcache.zip;

content:
custom-name: "Monkey Island 2 - Special Edition - LeChuck\u2019s Revenge - GOG"
files:
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
- gog: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Monkey Island 2 SE/Monkey2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/innoextract
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: --extract $gog --output-dir "$CACHE/"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Monkey Island 2 SE/
    src: $CACHE/app
- task:
    app: d3dx9_42 d3dcompiler_42 xact
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- input_menu:
    description: 'Choose your preferred language for game interface and subtitles:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - 0: English
    - 1: French
    - 2: Italian
    - 3: German
    - 4: Spanish
    preselect: 0
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Monkey Island 2 SE/lang.ini
    key: language
    section: language
    value: $INPUT_LANG
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Monkey Island 2 SE"; rm -f -r rm -f -r
      __support GameuxInstallHelper.dll goggame-1425039730.* language_setup.* webcache.zip;
wine:
  Desktop: true
